name: Mintek Mobile Data Solutions

overview:
Mintek Mobile Data Solutions focuses on creating efficiencies by pushing Enterprise Applications beyond the four walls.

It has a history in the Cable industry spanning more than a decade. It integrates with the 3 major cable billing systems in WinTrack SETS & WinTrack CRM product suites. WinTrack SETS automates warehouses for Comcast, TimeWarner, & Brighthouse.

WinTrack CRM allows cable companies the ability to push cable billing system information to handhelds that help automate door-to-door sales. It enables sales people to see customer history, capture signature, take credit card information, order installation all without lengthy phone calls & memorizing legacy systems. It also eliminates the need for sales people to come into the office and reduces the usage of paper.

WinTrack PM started out as a preventive maintenance application in the lodging industry six years ago and has grown into other verticals including Waste Water facilities.

Mintek is currently working on a SaaS application that will integrate the best features of WinTrack PM with a full asset management platform. This will allow companies to automate:

Asset Management Preventive Maintenance Inspections Rounds Capital Asset Planning Document & Contract Management
